articles.title: 'Felt and saw things that we shouldn’t think about’: Olympics triathlete after swimming in Seine river - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Paris Olympics athlete from Belgium Jolien Vermeylen slammed the organisers and said, 'The Seine has been dirty for a hundred years, so they can’t say that the safety of the athletes is a priority. That’s bulls**t!'
